duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent customer service and support to clients seeking insurance coverage.
Meet and exceed sales goals by prospecting new clients and renewing existing policies.
Demonstrate a good understanding of insurance products and policies to effectively guide clients in their decision-making process.
Utilize computer skills to manage client information, policy details, and insurance applications.
Maintain a strong work ethic and attendance to ensure consistent performance and client satisfaction.
Identify opportunities for growth and advancement within the insurance industry.
